meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: These regulations may be cited as the Plant (Importation and Pest Control) (Fees) Regulations.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Fees for examination and phytosanitary certificate
section.content: On application for the issue of a phytosanitary certificate, the fees payable for examination under section 6(3) of the Ordinance, and the issue of a certificate if appropriate, shall be as specified in Schedule 1.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Fees for visit to applicant’s premises for examination of plants
section.content: The fees payable under section 6(4) of the Ordinance for making an examination of plants at the premises of a person applying for a phytosanitary certificate shall be $115 for each visit.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Quarantine maintenance fees
section.content: The fees specified in Schedule 2 shall be payable for the maintenance of plants grown or propagated in any quarantine area.

section.name: s5
section.heading: Fees for treatment of plants and soil
section.content: The fees payable under the Ordinance for the treatment of plants and soil shall be as set out in Schedule 3.

schedule.name: sch1
schedule.heading: Fees for Examination of Plants

td.p: Exceeding 5 plants and not exceeding 20 plants
Exceeding 20 plants and not exceeding 50 plants
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 50 plants or part thereof
Exceeding 10 dozen and not exceeding 100 dozen
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 100 dozen or part thereof
Exceeding 200 plants and not exceeding 2 000 plants
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 2 000 plants or part thereof
Bulbs, Corms, Roots, Tubers for the purpose of propagation—
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 1 000 or part thereof
Exceeding 50 kg and not exceeding 200 kg
Exceeding 200 kg and not exceeding 500 kg
Exceeding 500 kg and not exceeding 1 000 kg
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 1 000 kg or part thereof
Exceeding 50 kg and not exceeding 500 kg
Exceeding 500 kg and not exceeding 1 000 kg
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 1 000 kg or part thereof
Exceeding 500 kg and not exceeding 1 000 kg
Exceeding 1 000 kg and not exceeding 2 000 kg
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 2 000 kg or part thereof
Exceeding 10 kg and not exceeding 50 kg
Exceeding 50 kg and not exceeding 200 kg
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 200 kg or part thereof
Exceeding 1 m3 and not exceeding 50 m3
Exceeding 50 m3 and not exceeding 100 m3
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 10 m3 or part thereof

schedule.text: Notwithstanding the above, the maximum fee for one single consignment shall be $1,544 inclusive of any fees payable under regulation 3.

td.p: Plants occupying an area not exceeding 0.5 m2 for a period not exceeding 3 months
Plants occupying an area exceeding 0.5 m2 for a period not exceeding 3 months—
Thereafter, each additional area of 0.5 m2 or part thereof
Plants occupying an area for a period exceeding 3 months—
The first 3 months (for each occupied area of 0.5 m2 or less)
Thereafter, each additional period of 3 months or part thereof (for each occupied area of 0.5 m2 or less)

schedule.name: sch3
schedule.heading: Fees for the Treatment of Plants and Soil

td.p: Thereafter, each additional multiple of 1 000 or part thereof
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 20 pieces or part thereof
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 100 kg or part thereof
Thereafter, each additional multiple of 40 kg or part thereof
